DOC.brief_summary: A 16-week single-blind , split-face , randomize study . Each patient serve control , receive onabotulinumtoxinA abobotulinumtoxinA randomize either leave right side face . Patients receive intradermal BTXA injection week 0 intramuscular BTXA injection week 2 . The objective examine effectiveness intradermal botulinum toxin type A ( BTXA ) injection improve skin texture midface lift reduce pore size sebum production , well investigate difference effectiveness onabotulinumtoxinA abobotulinumtoxinA use intradermal intramuscular injection method .
DOC.brief_title: Botulinum Toxin A Single Blind Split-Face Randomized Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: Female subject age 35 65 year ( inclusive ) exhibit static wrinkle follow area : glabella ( forehead frown ) , periorbital area ( crows foot ) . Static wrinkle additional area face also acceptable . Subject willing maintain skin care regimen throughout study already maintain skin care regime 4 week prior baseline . The subject able comply study procedure instruction commit attend study visit within give timeline . Subject judge good candidate study nurse upon identification dynamic and/or static wrinkle area movement , moderate amount skin laxity . Subject willing use contraception A sign informed consent form subject able give consent , prior study procedure perform . Sensitivity and/or contraindication botulinum toxin A ingredient contain botulinum toxin A product . Any medical condition , opinion investigator , would interfere safety study procedure ( e.g . autoimmune disease , history severe allergy , hypertrophic scar , immunotherapeutic treatment , inflammatory infectious complaint injection site , unable give consent ) Treatment botulinum toxin A injection neck face within 1 year baseline treatment Treatment facial filler less 1 year prior baseline Females childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed plan get pregnant course study . Previous treatment Lasers , Ultrasound Technology Radio Frequency face and/or neck within 1 year prior baseline . Treatment Accutane ( isotretinoin ) oral medication acne 1 year prior baseline .
